2. "clozapine" - This is a medication used to treat schizophrenia. It is not a disease entity.
3. "olanzapine" - This is a medication used to treat schizophrenia and bipolar disorder. It is not a disease entity.
4. "risperidone" - This is a medication used to treat schizophrenia and bipolar disorder. It is not a disease entity.
